column4: hey, i have what may be a slightly noobish question, i'm trying to run docker on openbox it, to do this the command appears to be "docker -display DISPLAY" with DISPLAY being the x display it connects to, what do i need to put in for DISPLAY?
you've already had more ideas than me :D
the -display option shouldnt be needed. but ":0.0" is the actual name of it.
if your having a segmentation, there is a failure with that particular version for some reason...
